definition.de: Eine Gewalttat, die von Einzelpersonen unter Verwendung von bewaffneten Waffen begangen wird
definition.dk: Voldelige handlinger, der begås ved hjælp af skydevåben.
definition.en-GB: An act of violence committed by individuals with the use of armed weapons
definition.en-US: An act of violence committed by individuals with the use of armed weapons
definition.pt-BR: Atos de violência cometidos por indivíduos com recurso a armas de fogo.
definition.pt-PT: Atos de violência cometidos por indivíduos com recurso a armas de fogo.
definition.zh-Hans: 个人用枪支等武器实施的暴力行为
